Text: just a general comment to people uploading tracker lists: YOU DONT NEED TO PUT IT IN A TEXT FILE!!! make it easier for EVERYONE ELSE by putting the tracker list directly into the torrent you are seeding, and just put some 1-kbyte text file explaining that the list is in the torrent---this way we can have the big list as soon as we have the torrent! much better approach!!!
when these trackers are added to the tracker list, for many trackers the message displayed is " No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it."what it means? plz.help
